verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ׀ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-and י֬וֹנַת <S%H3123><s%> Yo-nat dove אֵ֣לֶם <S%H482><s%> 'E-lem congregation רְ֭חֹקִים <S%H7350><s%> Re-cho-kim far abroad לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <S%H4387><s%> mich-Tam; Michtam בֶּֽאֱחֹ֨ז <S%H270><s%> be-'e-Choz took אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To פְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim when the Philistines בְּגַֽת׃ <S%H1661><s%> be-Gat. him in Gath חָנֵּ֣נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni Be merciful אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him unto me O God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שְׁאָפַ֣נִי <S%H7602><s%> she-'a-Fa-ni would swallow me up אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh; for man כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, daily לֹחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> lo-Chem he fighting יִלְחָצֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3905><s%> yil-cha-Tze-ni. oppresseth

שָׁאֲפ֣וּ <S%H7602><s%> sha-'a-Fu swallow שׁ֭וֹרְרַי <S%H8324><s%> vr-rai Mine enemies כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; would daily כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for רַבִּ֨ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim [me] up for [they be] many לֹחֲמִ֖ים <S%H3898><s%> lo-cha-Mim that fight לִ֣י li מָרֽוֹם׃ <S%H4791><s%> ma-Rom. against me O thou most High
י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom What time אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> 'i-Ra; I am afraid אֲ֝נִ֗י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni, I אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶבְטָֽח׃ <S%H982><s%> 'ev-Tach. I will trust

בֵּאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him In God אֲהַלֵּ֪ל <S%H1984><s%> 'a-hal-Lel I will praise דְּבָ֫ר֥וֹ <S%H1697><s%> de-Va-Ro his word בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him in God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <S%H982><s%> Ba-tach-ti I have put my trust לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> 'i-Ra; I will not fear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh can do בָשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> va-Sar what flesh לִֽי׃ Li.

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> Hai-yom Every day דְּבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai my words יְעַצֵּ֑בוּ <S%H6087><s%> ye-'atz-Tze-vu; they wrest עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai are against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֣ם <S%H4284><s%> mach-she-vo-Tam all their thoughts לָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> la-Ra'. [are] against me for evil

יָג֤וּרוּ׀ <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gu-ru They gather themselves together; יַצְפִּינוּ yatz-pi-nu כיִצְפֹּ֗ונוּ <S%H6845><s%> yitz-Po-nu, reserve קהֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like עֲקֵבַ֣י <S%H6119><s%> 'a-ke-Vai my steps יִשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> yish-Mo-ru; themselves they mark כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher, as they קִוּ֥וּ <S%H6960><s%> kiv-Vu when they wait נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. for my soul

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Because אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven of wickedness פַּלֶּט־ <S%H6405><s%> pal-let- Shall they escape לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; בְּ֝אַ֗ף <S%H639><s%> be-'Af, anger עַמִּ֤ים׀ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people הוֹרֵ֬ד <S%H3381><s%> ho-Red cast down אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. O God

נֹדִי֮ <S%H5112><s%> no-Di my wanderings סָפַ֪רְתָּ֫ה <S%H5608><s%> sa-Far-Tah Thou tellest אָ֥תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah you שִׂ֣ימָה <S%H7760><s%> Si-mah put דִמְעָתִ֣י <S%H1832><s%> dim-'a-Ti thou my tears בְנֹאדֶ֑ךָ <S%H4997><s%> ve-no-De-cha; into thy bottle הֲ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo, not בְּסִפְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5612><s%> be-sif-ra-Te-cha. bill

אָ֥֨ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יָ֘שׁ֤וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shu-vu turn אוֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vai [unto thee] then shall mine enemies אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> 'A-chor back בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom When אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> 'ek-Ra; I cry זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> zeh- This יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, this I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him for God לִֽי׃ Li.

בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Be-lo-him In God אֲהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> 'a-hal-Lel will I praise דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var; [his] word בַּ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in the LORD אֲהַלֵּ֥ל <S%H1984><s%> 'a-hal-Lel will I praise דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var. [his] word

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him In God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <S%H982><s%> Ba-tach-ti have I put my trust לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> 'i-Ra; I will not be afraid מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh can do אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam what man לִֽי׃ Li.

עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [are] upon me O God נְדָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H5088><s%> ne-da-Rei-cha; Thy vows אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> 'a-shal-Lem I will render תּוֹדֹ֣ת <S%H8426><s%> to-Dot praises לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הִצַּ֪לְתָּ <S%H5337><s%> hitz-Tzal-ta For thou hast delivered נַפְשִׁ֡י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul מִמָּוֶת֮ <S%H4194><s%> mi-ma-Vet from death הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo Indeed רַגְלַ֗י <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lai, [wilt] not [thou deliver] my feet מִ֫דֶּ֥חִי <S%H1762><s%> mid-De-chi from falling לְ֭הִֽתְהַלֵּךְ <S%H1980><s%> Le-hit-hal-lech that I may walk לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; God בְּ֝א֗וֹר <S%H216><s%> be-'or, in the light הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> Ha-chai-Yim. of the living
